snippet: South Africa's bowlers needed a little more than an hour of the final day's play to dismiss Sri Lanka for 281 in their second innings and claim a 206-run victory in the first test on Friday....
lead_paragraph: South Africa's bowlers needed a little more than an hour of the final day's play to dismiss Sri Lanka for 281 in their second innings and claim a 206-run victory in the first test on Friday.

headline.main: Dominant South Africa Crush Sri Lanka in Opener
headline.print_headline: Dominant South Africa Crush Sri Lanka in Opener
